mapper.insert: insert into member ( member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_lastlogin, member_joindate, member_birth, member_sex, member_email) values ( (SELECT MAX (MEMBER_NO) + 1 FROM MEMBER), #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone}, sysdate, sysdate, #{member_birth}, #{member_sex}, #{member_email} )
mapper.update: update member set member_lastlogin = sysdate where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where member_name = #{member_name} and member_birth = #{member_birth} and member_phone = #{member_phone}
select * from member where member_name = #{member_name} and member_email = #{member_email}
